summary: Execution dragging. Momentum inconsistent. System in place but underutilized. High awareness, low leverage.

wins: Maintaining daily interaction with structured system
Caught emotional drift before full crash
losses: SAM and execution tools not fully weaponized past awareness
ideas: Harden 'Brutal Mode' into callable function inside SAM
Score each day on input vs output delta

goals: Ship 1 concrete Tutor App feature this week
